snippet: The biggest problem with online dating sites? Success. Once you've helped users find their soul mate, they dump you. Anand Giridharadas writes in his latest Page Two column about one site's answer to this love business conundrum.
abstract: The biggest problem with online dating sites? Success. Once you've helped users find their soul mate, they dump you. Anand Giridharadas writes in his latest Page Two column about one site's answer to this love business conundrum.
